statements: SELECT * FROM viewership_trends;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewership_trends;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewership_trends WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM viewership_trends WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewership_trends ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewership_trends WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY viewer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM viewership_trends WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'USA' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT viewer_id, gender FROM viewership_trends WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND location LIKE 'NY%' ORDER BY gender DESC, viewer_id ASC
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewership_trends WHERE gender IN ('Male', 'Female') AND (age < 25 OR age > 40) ORDER BY age DESC, viewer_id ASC
SELECT viewer_id, location FROM viewership_trends WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND (location LIKE '%A%' OR location LIKE '%E%') ORDER BY location ASC, viewer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM viewers;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT viewer_id, trend_name FROM trends WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT viewer_id, trend_name FROM trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM trends GROUP BY trend_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date, viewers.viewer_id, age, gender FROM trends INNER JOIN viewers ON trends.viewer_id = viewers.viewer_id WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY trend_date DESC, age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_viewers FROM viewers;
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM trends GROUP BY trend_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM viewership_data ORDER BY viewer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewership_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT viewer_id, location FROM viewership_data WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM demographic_data ORDER BY income_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend_description, demographic_factor FROM trends_analysis;
SELECT * FROM viewership_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY viewing_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT viewer_id, gender, location FROM viewership_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT viewer_id, age, location FROM viewership_data WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT d.viewer_id, d.age_group, d.income_level, t.trend_description FROM demographic_data d JOIN trends_analysis t ON d.viewer_id = t.trend_id;

SELECT v.viewer_id, v.age, d.education_level, t.trend_description FROM viewership_data v JOIN demographic_data d ON v.viewer_id = d.viewer_id JOIN trends_analysis t ON v.viewer_id = t.trend_id WHERE v.age BETWEEN 25 AND 45 ORDER BY v.age DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT show_name, genre, release_date FROM show_data ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, show_id, rating FROM viewer_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT viewer_id, show_name, watched_duration FROM viewer_activity JOIN show_data ON viewer_activity.show_id = show_data.show_id;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location, occupation FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT show_id, show_name, genre, release_date, duration_minutes FROM show_data WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_date ASC
SELECT viewer_id, show_id, rating, review FROM viewer_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT viewer_id, show_name, watched_duration, start_time, end_time FROM viewer_activity WHERE viewer_id = 1234 ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT show_id, show_name, genre, release_date, duration_minutes FROM show_data WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY show_id ASC
SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT viewer_id, location FROM demographic_data ORDER BY viewer_id DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM viewership_data WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY rating DESC, duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT viewer_id, gender, location FROM demographic_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT show_title, rating FROM viewership_data WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, genre FROM viewer_preferences WHERE genre = 'Action' OR genre = 'Drama';
SELECT date, age_group, total_viewers FROM demographic_trends ORDER BY total_viewers DESC, date ASC;
